review: Easy to install. Huge variety of programs. Simple to navigate
author: patricia crowley

review: Totally happy with it. Good investment. Good deal.
author: Rico Suave

review: Love the Fire Stick!  I travel for work and have been extremely happy watching my favorite shows on hotel tvs.  Only had one problem in a hotel with wifi issues.  My Amazon movie kept reloading.  Two days later, Amazon sent me an email refunding me the rental cost for that movie, as they had noticed the movie had not played well for me.  What a nice surprise!
author: TLL

review: Great little piece of entertainment so the the price of itI got total five of them around my house and still want to get moreAlready put aside my google chrome cast and may never using it againThanks a lot
author: dung kim thai

review: Everything about this is both easy and great!
author: R. Fried

review: I'm so sad about this; the fire TV stick seemed to have it all in such a cute little package. Minimalism, style, efficiency, and it did everything I needed. Prime, Netflix, spotify, and then I plugged it in. At first, perfection. And then? Buffering. Buffering every 1-2 minutes. Constantly. I did all the trouble shooting, and then I packed it up and returned this little butthead.Then I spent the extra $50 and got the Amazon Fire TV set top. Best decision ever made. That was worth the money.
author: Kaitlin M.
